column4: the xubuntu site tells me i can install xubuntu through the ubuntu package manager, but i cant find it in there... is the site old or am i missing something?
did you do "sudo apt-get install xubuntu-desktop" ?
did you see xubuntu-desktop in the list?
you didn't see it in the apt-cache search list? how odd
did you change your /etc/apt/sources.list at all?
idk what's wrong. that package should be there.
did you do "sudo apt-get update" first?
you won't be able to install w/o internet
you need internet to install most of the stuff
you can download a xubuntu cd using another comp. and do a xubuntu fresh install.
